name: eqnbrtrd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: mtbird(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wn(wbr(c3, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wn(wbr(c3, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wn(wbr(c3, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c3))

comment: Substitution of equal classes into the negation of a binary relation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
